descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# 🎮 A Timeless Climbing Challenge with Beloved Santa!

Step into the boots of an adventurer with your trusty candy canes and an unstoppable will to climb! Santa Climber offers a unique and thrilling parkour experience, where physics-based mechanics and daring jumps take you across a world full of challenges and surprises. Scale snowy rooftops, navigate tricky obstacles, and conquer icy slides as you climb your way to victory.

# 🔥 Outrun the Heat:  Floor is Lava! 
Ready for the heat? In **Floor is Lava**, you’ll need to outpace the rising lava, race against the heat, and make it to the summit quickly before everything is toasted. Fast-paced gameplay and intense challenges… Dare to try?


[media]

# 💥 Challenge Yourself and Others:

In addition to the classic solo experience, Santa Climber lets you go head-to-head in competitive multiplayer. Race your friends or team up for co-op challenges. 

[media]

# 🧑‍🎄 Suit Up, Santa!

Why settle for just one Santa when you can be your kind of Santa? Santa Climber lets you express yourself with a growing collection of unique Santavatars. From community-favorite content creators to upcoming special seasonal costumes, there’s always a fresh way to stand out.

[media]

Are you ready for the ultimate climbing adventure? Grab your candy canes, beat the heat, or scale the snowy heights in Santa Climber! The adventure never ends, and the summit is always within reach—if you can endure the creeping rage!

# 🎮 A Timeless Climbing Challenge with Beloved Santa!

Step into the boots of an adventurer with your trusty candy canes and an unstoppable will to climb! Santa Climber offers a unique and thrilling parkour experience, where physics-based mechanics and daring jumps take you across a world full of challenges and surprises. Scale snowy rooftops, navigate tricky obstacles, and conquer icy slides as you climb your way to victory.

# 🔥 Outrun the Heat:  Floor is Lava! 
Ready for the heat? In **Floor is Lava**, you’ll need to outpace the rising lava, race against the heat, and make it to the summit quickly before everything is toasted. Fast-paced gameplay and intense challenges… Dare to try?

# 💥 Challenge Yourself and Others:

In addition to the classic solo experience, Santa Climber lets you go head-to-head in competitive multiplayer. Race your friends or team up for co-op challenges.

# 🧑‍🎄 Suit Up, Santa!

Why settle for just one Santa when you can be your kind of Santa? Santa Climber lets you express yourself with a growing collection of unique Santavatars. From community-favorite content creators to upcoming special seasonal costumes, there’s always a fresh way to stand out.
